getAccountDeposits(address).notice: Gets all deposits for a specific account.

getAccountIntents(address).notice: Gets the active intents for a specific account.

getDeposit(uint256).notice: Gets details for a single deposit.

getDepositFromIds(uint256[]).notice: Gets deposit details for a list of deposit IDs.

getIntent(bytes32).notice: Gets details for a single intent.

getIntents(bytes32[]).notice: Gets details for a list of intent hashes.
